title: Huge Amazon sale: epic deals on TVs, Fire tablets, Echo Dot, Fire TV Stick, and more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Score fantastic deals on Amazon's best-selling devices
article: For the first time since Prime Day, Amazon is offering fantastic deals on its best-selling devices, and we're rounding up the top bargains from Amazon's sale below. You can find record-low prices and first-time discounts on Fire tablets, TVs, the Echo Dot, Fire TV Stick, and more.

Some of the best deals we've spotted include the Fire TV Stick Lite marked down to just $24.99, a first-time discount on the all-new Fire HD 10 Kids tablet, which brings the price down to a record low of $129.99 (was $199.99), and the Echo Dot Kids Edition on sale for $39.99 (was $59.99). If you're looking for TV deals you can snag the all-new Toshiba 50-inch 4K TV on sale for a record-low price of $369.99 (was $469.99), and this budget 32-inch TV on sale for only $139.99 (was $199.99). See more of the best device deals from Amazon's latest sale below, and keep in mind, these are limited-time offers, so you should snag these bargains now before it's too late.

See more of the best cheap TV deals and sales, and if you're looking for more tech bargains, you can see the best back to school sales from retailers like Best Buy, Walmart, and Amazon. You can also look forward to upcoming offers with our guide to the best Labor Day sales of 2021.
